title: Logo Pops Up Nothing Happens
body:
Hello there :D. 

So today I woke up unable to play League of Legends. I would click on the shortcut and the logo quickly appears then quickly disappears. Then I would wait, but nothing happens. I went to the forms and tried to look for solutions, but none of them worked. Please help. I just want to play League of Legends for a little bit more before I have to start college. :c 

If there is anything I can do, please let me know, and if anyone can relate to this problem, please comment or thumbs up this thread.

replies.body: Yeah same here... I can only connect if I use my phone's HotSpot to log in. Afterwards I can switch back to my ISP once I'm in the client but I can't start a game because it won't load me in and say I have a firewall issue, even though I turned it off and it doesn't happen when using my phone's HotSpot.
Same. Started like two days ago and haven't played since.
Same here!!already delete some files to force the download,but doesn't change...

Hey everyone,

If the patcher does not even appear after running League of Legends, try the steps in this link:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/zPUA7Zyg-new-having-issues-patching-416-click-here

The steps in these guides usually help fix issues with the patcher either not appearing correctly, or not downloading properly.  While this fixes most issues, there is a chance that your patcher still won't open.  If your ready to toss your computer out your window in frustration, don't stress out too much just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support where we can work with you one-on-one to get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following info:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
